name: Ultimate Highway Racer 2018
description:
“Car Racing Like Never Before”


HINTS:

- The faster you drive the more score can you get
- Select your favorite racing car and customize and upgrade them
- When driving over 70 km/h, overtake racing cars closely to get extra bonus
- Driving car in opposite direction in two-way mode gives you extra score and cash

Game Play Controls:

- Tilt
- Steering
- Buttons

Game Play Modes:

- Free
- Career
- Time Trial
- Endless Racing


Game Play Scenes:

- Sunny
- Rainy
- Snow Falling
- City Highway

Exciting Features:

- HD Graphics
- Challenging Missions
- Endless Racing Modes
- 2D & 3D Camera Views
- Highway Racing Tracks
